product_name: Pearl Izumi EM Trail M2 Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Built to provide a smooth, stable trail-running experience, the women's Pearl Izumi EM Trail M2 Trail-Running shoes offer your feet a minimalist fit and feel for comfort and performance. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Ligthweight, breathable nylon mesh uppers feature welded thermoplastic urethane overlays for lightweight support and structure. Polyester mesh linings are highly breathable for extended comfort. M2 EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and energy return; midsoles are neutral but feature added stability on both the lateral and medial sides. Broad carbon rubber outsoles on the Pearl Izumi EM Trail M2 Trail-Running shoes offer a stable platform; hard EVA forefoot rock plates protect feet from trail debris.
